concept.title: About the TXOne Stellar Series and StellarOne

conbody.p:
TXOne Stellar series is a first-of-its-kind OT endpoint protection platform, which includes:
TXOne StellarOne, the centralized management console designed to streamline administration of both StellarProtect for modernized systems and StellarProtect (Legacy Model) for legacy systems.
StellarProtect, for industrial-grade next-generation antivirus endpoint security deployment for modernized ICS endpoints
StellarProtect (Legacy Model), for trust-list-based application lockdown of legacy and fixed-use ICS endpoints with on-demand AV scan
Together, the Stellar series allows protection for modernized and legacy systems running side-byside to be coordinated and maintained from the same management console, helping protect businesses against security threats and increase productivity.
